title: Window Coverings, Walk-in Closets, Fitness Center
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 785 Sq.
The quaint cottages that comprise Mission Sierra enclose spacious one and two bedroom apartment homes.
Expansive balconies overlook lavish courtyards in this natural park-like setting.
It is an environment that restores, revives and relaxes.

While you'll feel as if you've retreated to an oasis in the country, Mission Sierra is actually centrally located and convenient to BART and Highway 880, providing you direct access to San Francisco, the Silicon Valley and the rest of the Bay Area.
We offer anywhere from a 3 to 12 month lease terms.
Price will vary for each term.
Pricing, availability, and move in date subject to change at any time.
Actual rental rates determined by move-in date and lease term chosen.
All apartments are at first come first serve, restrictions apply.
*Pictures are of two bedroom two bath model.
Please call the office for full details.
Indoor cats and dogs are allowed.
Dogs $50 per month, Dogs over 50lbs, $75 per month.
Please see the link in this ad to visit our website - all income requirements, tour and application options are available.
